title: [rustbuild] --target without --host runs no host tests

labels.name: T-bootstrap
labels.description: Relevant to the bootstrap subteam: Rust's build system (x.py and src/bootstrap)

body:
Running UI tests seems to not be working for some reason?

```
$ python x.py test src/test/ui/ --stage=1 --target=x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --verbose
```
